name: Frontend
content: The user interface and presentation layer of the e-commerce platform. It includes web pages, mobile apps, and other user-facing elements.

name: Backend
content: The server-side logic responsible for processing requests, handling business logic, and interacting with the database.

name: Database
content: The storage system that stores and manages product data, user information, orders, and other essential data.

name: Payment Gateway
content: A service that securely handles payment transactions between the customer, the e-commerce platform, and financial institutions.

name: Product Catalog
content: A centralized repository that stores and organizes information about the products available for sale on the platform.

name: Shopping Cart
content: A feature that allows users to collect and manage the products they want to purchase before proceeding to checkout.

name: Order Management
content: The process of handling and tracking customer orders from the time they are placed until they are delivered or fulfilled.

name: User Authentication
content: The system that manages user registration, login, and security features to protect user accounts and data.

name: Inventory Management
content: A component that monitors and updates the availability of products in stock, ensuring accurate stock levels.

name: Search and Filtering
content: Tools that help users find products quickly and efficiently by searching and applying filters based on various criteria.

name: Recommendations
content: Personalized product recommendations based on user behavior and preferences to enhance the shopping experience.

name: Reviews and Ratings
content: A feature that allows users to leave reviews and rate products, providing valuable feedback for other shoppers.

name: Analytics
content: Tools and services that collect and analyze data to gain insights into user behavior, sales performance, and other key metrics.

name: Content Management
content: A system to manage and organize the content of the e-commerce platform, including product descriptions, images, and promotional content.
